text: Indication Strategies Right sided heart failure and Right ventricular assist device pulmonary hypertension (RVAD); Consider ECMO Inhaled nitric oxide Pulmonary hypertension and Inhaled epoprostenol severe hypoxia Left sided heart failure and Intra-aortic balloon pump counter severe hypoxia pulsation Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) Cardiopulmonary bypass Massive hemorrhage Uterine artery embolization Recombinant factor Vlla Removal of circulating Continuous hemofiltration amniotic fluid contents and improve organ perfusion Plasmapheresis Cell salvage combined with blood filtration Disseminated intravascular Serum protease inhibitors coagulation Anaphylaxis High-dose corticosteroid administration
